1.title: ITalk
1.content: This project represents my inaugural full-stack endeavor – a modest yet feature-rich blog that resembles a network. Throughout its development, I diligently applied best practices to enhance my skills. The tech stack includes React, Node.js, MongoDB, Redux Toolkit, and Express. I also delved into JWT tokens for authentication, implemented server-side pagination and post filtering, secured routes, and introduced role-based access control, distinguishing between admin and user roles.
